article_title: Woman who lost brother on MH370 loses stepdaughter on MH17
article_text:
Just One More Thing...

og.description: An Australian woman, Kaylene Mann, who lost her brother when Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 disappeared in March was told Friday that her stepdaughter was on board the airline’s MH17 flight that was shot down in Ukraine.
og.title: Woman who lost brother on MH370 loses stepdaughter on MH17
